page.title: 04Village Hall,Llangybi
page.content: Llangybi is fortunate in having a Village hall.It is leased from the Llangybi Estate but villagers are trying to buy it,as the hall is the only meeting place now that the school has closed. The hall is managed by a committee representing the village and participating organizations. Regular weekly users are:_ Playgroup_which meets three mornings a week,with 8 children,2 supervisors and 1 mother_helper.There is also a small mother and toddler group. Youth Club_which meets on Monday nights with 15_20 young people Brownies_which meets on Teusday nights with 11 girls,and leadersBrown Owl,Wood Owl and 1 teenage helper The Pensioners_meet on alternate Monday afternoons and there is a whist drive on alternate Tuesday evenings
